title: About That Explosive Video (Ep 1204)
description:
In this episode, I address the blowup on Fox News last night between me and Geraldo Rivera, and what it was really about. I also address the shameless plagiarism of the Trump plan by Joe Biden. I discuss another dreadful lie by AOC on cable news. 

News Picks:

Coverage and video of my explosive appearance with Geraldo last night on Fox.

Democrats pushes the impeachment hoax while the Wuhan virus raged. 

The dreadful Democrats are trying to slip abortion funding into the Coronavirus package.


Media hacks are wondering why trust in the media is nonexistent. 


China is repeating the Soviet’s Chernobyl failures. 

Joe Biden basically stole President Trump’s Coronavirus response plan.


More devastating information about the Spygate plotters and that infamous Trump Tower meeting.

The CDC budget is larger now than under the Obama administration. 


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
